text: ittae geudeul-eun geu an-eseo soli jilleo guwon-eul cheonghani juyeo jeohuileul guhayeo jusoseo jeohuiga haji ani haessdeon seonhaeng-eul silcheonhagessnaida hana nim-i neohuideul-ege geu an-eseo suggo hal chungbunhan salm-eul juji anihaessdeonyo ttohan neohuiege gyeong-gojado dolaehaess eossnola geuleohamae ijeneun neohui haeng wiui gyeolgwaleul masbol ttaeini joeindeul egeneun guwonjaga eobsnola
